basic_info.description: I am currently a front-end engineer at Amazon in the retail org working on the shopping design team. My main priotrites include helping our designers + engineers have an easier work experience. I help build products that assit them - whether it be by creating documetnation sites that thousands of employees see every day, or dedicated tools specific to a team. Prior to my front-end role, I was a design technologist for several years. This role was had me at the intersection of Sr UX designers and engineers. I created several multi-phased, high-fidelity web protoypes to help our teams gain confidence from leadership and our end users. Many of these protoypes ultimatley helped drive what is seen on the Seller Central site today!

projects.title: Animal Shelter
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on adopting animals from animal shelter.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!

experience.title: B.A In Digital Media (Web Focus) - W/ Minor In Computer Science
technologies: Digital Video, Imaging, and Interactive Design
